name: NNRat.cast_nonneg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
q : NNRat
⊢ LE.le 0 ↑q
decl:
lemma NNRat.cast_nonneg (q : ℚ≥0) : 0 ≤ (q : α) := by
  rw [cast_def]; exact div_nonneg q.num.cast_nonneg q.den.cast_nonneg

name: nnqsmul_nonneg
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
a : α
q : NNRat
ha : LE.le 0 a
⊢ LE.le 0 (HSMul.hSMul q a)
decl:
lemma nnqsmul_nonneg (q : ℚ≥0) (ha : 0 ≤ a) : 0 ≤ q • a := by
  rw [NNRat.smul_def]; exact mul_nonneg q.cast_nonneg ha

name: Nonneg.coe_inv
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
a : Subtype fun x => LE.le 0 x
⊢ Eq (↑(Inv.inv a)) (Inv.inv ↑a)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
protected theorem coe_inv (a : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) : ((a⁻¹ : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) : α) = (a : α)⁻¹ :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.inv_mk
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
x : α
hx : LE.le 0 x
⊢ Eq (Inv.inv ⟨x, hx⟩) ⟨Inv.inv x, ⋯⟩
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inv_mk (hx : 0 ≤ x) :
    (⟨x, hx⟩ : { x : α // 0 ≤ x })⁻¹ = ⟨x⁻¹, inv_nonneg.2 hx⟩ :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.coe_div
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
a b : Subtype fun x => LE.le 0 x
⊢ Eq (↑(HDiv.hDiv a b)) (HDiv.hDiv ↑a ↑b)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
protected theorem coe_div (a b : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) : ((a / b : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) : α) = a / b :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.mk_div_mk
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
x y : α
hx : LE.le 0 x
hy : LE.le 0 y
⊢ Eq (HDiv.hDiv ⟨x, hx⟩ ⟨y, hy⟩) ⟨HDiv.hDiv x y, ⋯⟩
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mk_div_mk (hx : 0 ≤ x) (hy : 0 ≤ y) :
    (⟨x, hx⟩ : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) / ⟨y, hy⟩ = ⟨x / y, div_nonneg hx hy⟩ :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.coe_zpow
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
a : Subtype fun x => LE.le 0 x
n : Int
⊢ Eq (↑(HPow.hPow a n)) (HPow.hPow (↑a) n)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
protected theorem coe_zpow (a : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) (n : ℤ) :
    ((a ^ n : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) : α) = (a : α) ^ n :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.mk_zpow
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
x : α
hx : LE.le 0 x
n : Int
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow ⟨x, hx⟩ n) ⟨HPow.hPow x n, ⋯⟩
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mk_zpow (hx : 0 ≤ x) (n : ℤ) :
    (⟨x, hx⟩ : { x : α // 0 ≤ x }) ^ n = ⟨x ^ n, zpow_nonneg hx n⟩ :=
  rfl

name: Nonneg.coe_nnratCast
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
q : NNRat
⊢ Eq ↑↑q ↑q
decl: @[simp, norm_cast] lemma coe_nnratCast (q : ℚ≥0) : (q : {x : α // 0 ≤ x}) = (q : α) := rfl

name: Nonneg.mk_nnratCast
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
q : NNRat
⊢ Eq ⟨↑q, ⋯⟩ ↑q
decl: @[simp] lemma mk_nnratCast (q : ℚ≥0) : (⟨q, q.cast_nonneg⟩ : {x : α // 0 ≤ x}) = q := rfl

name: Nonneg.coe_nnqsmul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
q : NNRat
a : Subtype fun x => LE.le 0 x
⊢ Eq (↑(HSMul.hSMul q a)) (HSMul.hSMul q ↑a)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast] lemma coe_nnqsmul (q : ℚ≥0) (a : {x : α // 0 ≤ x}) :
    ↑(q • a) = (q • a : α) := rfl

name: Nonneg.mk_nnqsmul
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : LinearOrderedSemifield α
q : NNRat
a : α
ha : LE.le 0 a
⊢ Eq (↑⟨HSMul.hSMul q a, ⋯⟩) (HSMul.hSMul q a)
decl:
@[simp] lemma mk_nnqsmul (q : ℚ≥0) (a : α) (ha : 0 ≤ a) :
    (⟨q • a, by rw [NNRat.smul_def]; exact mul_nonneg q.cast_nonneg ha⟩ : {x : α // 0 ≤ x}) =
      q • a := rfl
